content:
TITLE: Analyzing Task Performance Metrics for Database Operations
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows a table of performance metrics for various database operations, including object additions, modifications, and searches. It provides counts, total time, average time, and retry statistics for different object types.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Evolveum/docs/blob/master/midpoint/projects/midscale/design/tasks/buckets/detailed-results-new.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
+------------------------------------+-------+-----------------+-----+-----+------+---------+------------------+-----+-----+------+----------+
| Operation                          | Count | Total time (ms) | Min | Max |  Avg | Retries | Wasted time (ms) | Min | Max |  Avg | Wasted % |
+------------------------------------+-------+-----------------+-----+-----+------+---------+------------------+-----+-----+------+----------+
| addObject.TaskType                 |     4 |              16 |   0 |  16 |  4.0 |         |                  |     |     |      |          |
| audit                              | 2,000 |           2,145 |   0 |  35 |  1.1 |         |                  |     |     |      |          |
| getObject.RoleType                 | 1,000 |             331 |   0 |  16 |  0.3 |         |                  |     |     |      |          |
| getObject.TaskType                 |    60 |             114 |   0 |  16 |  1.9 |         |                  |     |     |      |          |
| getObject.UserType                 | 3,000 |             808 |   0 |  16 |  0.3 |         |                  |     |     |      |          |
| getVersion.SystemConfigurationType |     1 |               0 |   0 |   0 |  0.0 |         |                  |     |     |      |          |
| modifyObject.TaskType              |   266 |           1,422 |   0 |  39 |  5.3 |       1 |               35 |   0 |  35 |  0.1 |    2.46% |
| modifyObject.UserType              | 3,000 |           6,271 |   0 | 130 |  2.1 |      96 |            3,813 |   0 | 130 |  1.3 |   60.80% |
| modifyObjectDynamically.TaskType   |    21 |             441 |   0 | 161 | 21.0 |       6 |              335 |   0 | 150 | 16.0 |   75.96% |
| searchObjects.FunctionLibraryType  |     1 |               3 |   3 |   3 |  3.0 |         |                  |     |     |      |          |
| searchObjects.NodeType             |     2 |               0 |   0 |   0 |  0.0 |         |                  |     |     |      |          |
| searchObjects.TaskType             | 2,058 |           2,024 |   0 |  17 |  1.0 |         |                  |     |     |      |          |
| searchObjects.UserType             | 1,033 |             297 |   0 |  16 |  0.3 |         |                  |     |     |      |          |
+------------------------------------+-------+-----------------+-----+-----+------+---------+------------------+-----+-----+------+----------+
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Analyzing Work Bucket Management Performance
DESCRIPTION: This snippet presents performance metrics for work bucket management operations, including completion, creation, and handling of scenarios where no more buckets are available. It shows counts, total time, average time, and conflict statistics.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Evolveum/docs/blob/master/midpoint/projects/midscale/design/tasks/buckets/detailed-results-new.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
+-----------------------------------------+-------+-----------------+-----+-----+------+-----------+------------------+-----+-----+------+--------+------------+------------------+-----+-----+-----+---+
| Operation                               | Count | Total time (ms) | Min | Max |  Avg | Conflicts | Wasted time (ms) | Min | Max |  Avg |      % | Wait count | Waited time (ms) | Min | Max | Avg | % |
+-----------------------------------------+-------+-----------------+-----+-----+------+-----------+------------------+-----+-----+------+--------+------------+------------------+-----+-----+-----+---+
| completeWorkBucket                      |    17 |             286 |  12 |  27 | 16.8 |           |                  |     |     |      |        |            |                  |     |     |     |   |
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Analyzing Work Bucket Performance Metrics for PostgreSQL Operations
DESCRIPTION: This snippet presents a table of performance metrics for various work bucket operations in PostgreSQL. It includes data on operation counts, total time, average time, conflicts, and wait times for different types of operations such as completing work buckets and getting new work buckets.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Evolveum/docs/blob/master/midpoint/projects/midscale/design/tasks/buckets/detailed-results-old.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
+-----------------------------------------+-------+-----------------+--------+--------+----------+-----------+------------------+-----+-------+-------+--------+------------+------------------+--------+--------+----------+--------+
| Operation                               | Count | Total time (ms) |    Min |    Max |      Avg | Conflicts | Wasted time (ms) | Min |   Max |   Avg |      % | Wait count | Waited time (ms) |    Min |    Max |      Avg |      % |
+-----------------------------------------+-------+-----------------+--------+--------+----------+-----------+------------------+-----+-------+-------+--------+------------+------------------+--------+--------+----------+--------+
| completeWorkBucket                      |   257 |          16,281 |      7 |  2,254 |     63.4 |           |                  |     |       |       |        |            |                  |        |        |          |        |
| getWorkBucket.createdNew                |   257 |         175,705 |      0 |  9,220 |    683.7 |       124 |           90,188 |  11 | 9,199 | 350.9 | 51.33% |            |                  |        |        |          |        |
| getWorkBucket.noMoreBucketsDefinite     |     1 |          22,183 | 22,183 | 22,183 | 22,183.0 |         1 |              826 | 826 |   826 | 826.0 |  3.72% |          1 |           21,353 | 21,353 | 21,353 | 21,353.0 | 96.26% |
| getWorkBucket.noMoreBucketsNotScavenger |    29 |           6,185 |      0 |  2,259 |    213.3 |         7 |            6,082 | 570 | 2,256 | 209.7 | 98.33% |            |                  |        |        |          |        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------+-----------------+--------+--------+----------+-----------+------------------+-----+-------+-------+--------+------------+------------------+--------+--------+----------+--------+
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Summarizing Task Performance Information
DESCRIPTION: This snippet provides a summary of task performance, including items processed, errors, progress, processing time, wall clock time, and throughput statistics. It gives an overview of the task's efficiency and execution time.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Evolveum/docs/blob/master/midpoint/projects/midscale/design/tasks/buckets/detailed-results-new.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
*** Performance information
  TaskPerformanceInformation:
    Parts:
      null =>
        URI: null
        Items processed: 1000
        Errors: 0
        Progress: 1000
        Processing time: 463266.13
        Wall clock time: 120208
        Earliest start time: 2021-04-13T20:25:38.704+02:00
        Summary: Throughput: 499.1 per minute (1,000 items, 120.2 ms per item)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Analyzing Work Bucket Performance Statistics (Plaintext)
DESCRIPTION: This snippet displays performance statistics for work bucket operations, including operation counts, total time, average time, conflicts, and wait times. It provides insights into the efficiency of different operations in a distributed task processing system.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Evolveum/docs/blob/master/midpoint/projects/midscale/design/tasks/buckets/detailed-results-old.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
+-----------------------------------------+-------+-----------------+--------+--------+----------+-----------+------------------+-----+--------+---------+--------+------------+------------------+--------+--------+----------+--------+
| Operation                               | Count | Total time (ms) |    Min |    Max |      Avg | Conflicts | Wasted time (ms) | Min | Max |  Avg |     % | Wait count | Waited time (ms) |    Min |    Max |      Avg |      % |
+-----------------------------------------+-------+-----------------+--------+--------+----------+-----------+------------------+-----+--------+---------+--------+------------+------------------+--------+--------+----------+--------+
| completeWorkBucket                      |    17 |             270 |      0 |     31 |     15.9 |           |                  |     |     |      |       |            |                  |        |        |          |        |
| getWorkBucket.createdNew                |    17 |          16,254 |      0 |  5,735 |    956.1 |         3 |            1,615 |  52 | 913 | 95.0 | 9.94% |            |                  |        |        |          |        |
| getWorkBucket.noMoreBucketsDefinite     |     1 |          21,061 | 21,061 | 21,061 | 21,061.0 |           |                  |     |     |      |       |          1 |           21,052 | 21,052 | 21,052 | 21,052.0 | 99.96% |
| getWorkBucket.noMoreBucketsNotScavenger |     3 |               0 |      0 |      0 |      0.0 |           |                  |     |     |      |       |            |                  |        |        |          |        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------+-----------------+--------+--------+----------+-----------+------------------+-----+--------+---------+--------+------------+------------------+--------+--------+----------+--------+
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Displaying Task Performance Information for PostgreSQL Operations
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the performance information for a specific task, including the number of items processed, processing time, wall clock time, and throughput statistics. It provides insights into the efficiency of the task execution in the PostgreSQL environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Evolveum/docs/blob/master/midpoint/projects/midscale/design/tasks/buckets/detailed-results-old.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
*** Performance information
  TaskPerformanceInformation:
    Parts:
      null =>
        URI: null
        Items processed: 1000
        Errors: 0
        Progress: 1000
        Processing time: 463440.31000000006
        Wall clock time: 26197
        Earliest start time: 2021-04-09T18:16:31.317+02:00
        Summary: Throughput: 2,290.3 per minute (1,000 items, 26.2 ms per item)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Summarizing Task Performance Information (Plaintext)
DESCRIPTION: This snippet presents a summary of task performance information, including the number of items processed, processing time, wall clock time, and throughput. It provides an overview of the overall task execution efficiency.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Evolveum/docs/blob/master/midpoint/projects/midscale/design/tasks/buckets/detailed-results-old.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
*** Performance information
  TaskPerformanceInformation:
    Parts:
      null =>
        URI: null
        Items processed: 1000
        Errors: 0
        Progress: 1000
        Processing time: 431816.64999999985
        Wall clock time: 121569
        Earliest start time: 2021-04-13T18:55:45.738+02:00
        Summary: Throughput: 493.5 per minute (1,000 items, 121.6 ms per item)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Performance Test Results - Initial Run
DESCRIPTION: Performance metrics showing operation counts, timing, conflicts and wait times for work bucket operations in tabular format. Includes metrics for completeWorkBucket, getWorkBucket operations with throughput of 2,503.9 items per minute.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Evolveum/docs/blob/master/midpoint/projects/midscale/design/tasks/buckets/detailed-results-new.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
+-----------------------------------------+-------+-----------------+--------+--------+----------+-----------+------------------+-----+-------+------+--------+------------+------------------+--------+--------+----------+--------+
| completeWorkBucket                      |   257 |          20,347 |     10 |  2,601 |     79.2 |           |                  |     |       |      |        |            |                  |        |        |          |        |
| getWorkBucket.createdNew                |   257 |          98,631 |      6 |  5,284 |    383.8 |       187 |           19,047 |  11 | 3,102 | 74.1 | 19.31% |            |                  |        |        |          |        |
| getWorkBucket.noMoreBucketsDefinite     |     1 |          21,262 | 21,262 | 21,262 | 21,262.0 |           |                  |     |       |      |        |          1 |           21,246 | 21,246 | 21,246 | 21,246.0 | 99.92% |
| getWorkBucket.noMoreBucketsNotScavenger |    29 |             161 |      0 |     16 |      5.6 |           |                  |     |       |      |        |            |                  |        |        |          |        |
```

TITLE: Operation Performance Metrics Table
DESCRIPTION: ASCII table showing database operation performance metrics including counts, timing, retries and wasted time statistics across different operation types.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Evolveum/docs/blob/master/midpoint/projects/midscale/design/tasks/buckets/detailed-results-old.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
+-----------------------------------+-------+-----------------+-----+-----+-----+---------+------------------+-----+-----+-----+----------+
| Operation                         | Count | Total time (ms) | Min | Max | Avg | Retries | Wasted time (ms) | Min | Max | Avg | Wasted % |
+-----------------------------------+-------+-----------------+-----+-----+-----+---------+------------------+-----+-----+-----+----------+
| addObject.TaskType                |     4 |               9 |   2 |   3 | 2.3 |         |                  |     |     |     |          |
| audit                             | 2,000 |           2,738 |   0 |  34 | 1.4 |         |                  |     |     |     |          |
| getObject.RoleType                | 1,000 |             437 |   0 |  16 | 0.4 |         |                  |     |     |     |          |
```

TITLE: Task Performance Information Block

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
*** Performance information
  TaskPerformanceInformation:
    Parts:
      null =>
        URI: null
        Items processed: 1000
        Errors: 0
        Progress: 1000
        Processing time: 449605.64
        Wall clock time: 117457
        Earliest start time: 2021-04-13T20:58:21.120+02:00
        Summary: Throughput: 510.8 per minute (1,000 items, 117.5 ms per item)
```

TITLE: Work Bucket Management Performance Table

+-----------------------------------------+-------+-----------------+-----+-------+------+-----------+------------------+-------+-------+------+--------+------------+------------------+-----+-----+-----+---+

TITLE: Performance Metrics Table Format
DESCRIPTION: Tabular representation of performance metrics showing operation counts, timing, and retry statistics. Data is formatted in a console-style table with columns for operation name, count, timing details, and retry information.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Evolveum/docs/blob/master/midpoint/projects/midscale/design/tasks/buckets/detailed-results-new.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
+-----------------------------------+-------+-----------------+-----+-------+-------+---------+------------------+-----+-------+-------+----------+
| Operation                         | Count | Total time (ms) | Min |   Max |   Avg | Retries | Wasted time (ms) | Min |   Max |   Avg | Wasted % |
+-----------------------------------+-------+-----------------+-----+-------+-------+---------+------------------+-----+-------+-------+----------+
| addObject.TaskType                |    30 |              79 |   1 |     4 |   2.6 |         |                  |     |       |       |          |
| audit                             | 2,000 |           6,609 |   0 |    95 |   3.3 |       1 |               87 |   0 |    87 |   0.0 |    1.32% |
| getObject.RoleType                | 1,000 |             810 |   0 |    11 |   0.8 |         |                  |     |       |       |          |
| getObject.TaskType                |   834 |           1,748 |   0 |    12 |   2.1 |         |                  |     |       |       |          |
```
